name: Shooting The Dice
description:
WASD to move, Space to roll Roll through enemy bullets to gain your ammo back: The theme was Roll of the Dice, which we interpreted as our player (the dice) rolling to get ammo back, then we used this as the main mechanic Programming: Wolfenrahd

https://wolfenrahd.itch.io/

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC43ocReBfXYy9Cf6j1nufDg/

Art/Music/Sound: Spike Studio

https://spikestudio.itch.io/

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCcVCPcXA0nbhnVTwBTZ9XNw

Font used:

Pingwing by Tokesnation

https://www.dafont.com/pingwing.font

Known Bugs:

- Cards display after death in the menu screen (just select one it doesn't affect anything)

- Spawn clicking a card gets tons of stats (if you feel like being powerful here's a way)

- Successful roll doesn't always make particles
